paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: LQT2 form of congenital long QT syndrome

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 28 after experiencing syncope.

individual_records.phenotype_details: had a family history of LQT2
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 31, with a family history of the condition.
The individual is a carrier but remains asymptomatic.

functional_data.summary: The N588K mutation results in a loss of function of the hERG channel.

variants.additional_notes: The N588K variant is associated with increased risk of arrhythmias.
key_quotes: Loss-of-function hERG mutations give rise to the LQT2 form of congenital long QT syndrome.
The N588K mutation results in a loss of function of the hERG channel.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 gene was successfully extracted.
